clause_text: The narrator was twenty-two years old
The narrator stayed in a small town
The narrator worked at a local bookstore
The narrator was alone in the store
The narrator was twenty-two years old
and staying in a small town
The narrator had started their first job
at a local bookstore
The narrator's grandpa was bedridden at home
The narrator's parents had gone out of town
for the weekend
The narrator was working alone at a bookstore

The narrator heard a voice in their head
The voice told the narrator to light a candle for their grandpa
The narrator was working alone at a bookstore

The narrator visited the old church down the street
The narrator's grandpa was bedridden

The narrator was alone in a bookstore

The voice told the narrator to light a candle for their grandpa at the old church
The narrator visited the church

The narrator's grandpa had been bedridden for almost a year before the event

The narrator felt a strong urge to return home

The narrator returns home

The grandpa gradually regains his strength
